name: part_008
file: tmp_【重大告知あり！！】FBKINGDOM Fest. #機密解禁フブキングダム【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [ES9vrNjxiIQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki and the Fubunicomets discuss her upcoming new song announcement and interact with the audience's comments.
Performance of the song 'Bokura no Seiza'.

subtitles.original: 今からわが新曲発表するって
subtitles.english: I heard you're announcing a new song now.

subtitles.original: あ、そうだよ
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right.

subtitles.original: 新曲なんですか？
subtitles.english: Is it a new song?

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ、なんとですね...
subtitles.english: That's right, and guess what...

subtitles.original: みんなコメントも可愛いって
subtitles.english: Everyone is saying it's cute in the comments.

subtitles.original: 可愛いって言ってるよ
subtitles.english: They're saying we're cute.

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃん
subtitles.english: Of course we are.

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃん
subtitles.english: Of course we are.

subtitles.original: 俺ら可愛い
subtitles.english: We're cute.

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃん
subtitles.english: Of course we are.

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃん、俺ら可愛い
subtitles.english: Of course we are, we're cute.

subtitles.original: これが新しいフブニコメントさんの姿だよ
subtitles.english: This is the new look of Fubunicomet-san.

subtitles.original: 嘘でしょ、嘘でしょ
subtitles.english: No way, no way.

subtitles.original: じゃーん！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: そんなので呪い解いてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll break the curse for you.

subtitles.original: 同じ顔しないで、差別できなくなる
subtitles.english: Don't make the same face, I won't be able to tell you apart.

subtitles.original: 差別、区別ね
subtitles.english: Distinction, you mean.

subtitles.original: うわぁ、じゃあないんだよ
subtitles.english: Whoa, it's not "whoa".

subtitles.original: えっと、ごめんごめん、えっと、今から新曲...
subtitles.english: Um, sorry, sorry, um, now the new song...

subtitles.original: アルバムからですね、作詞・作曲・編曲 Revoさんの楽曲を...
subtitles.english: From the album, a song with lyrics, composition, and arrangement by Revo...

subtitles.original: ...歌わせていただこうと思います！
subtitles.english: ...I'm going to sing!

subtitles.original: えー、すごい！
subtitles.english: Whoa, amazing!

subtitles.original: Revo、総力戦すぎるでしょ
subtitles.english: Revo, that's such an all-out effort.

subtitles.original: でもね、わかるわかる、わかるわかる
subtitles.english: But you know, I get it, I get it.

subtitles.original: あー、すっちゃん分かりそうだけどね
subtitles.english: Ah, Su-chan seems to get it.

subtitles.original: すっちゃん分かってない、分かるよ
subtitles.english: Su-chan doesn't get it. I do!

subtitles.original: 心臓を捧げるんだよ
subtitles.english: Dedicating your heart.

subtitles.original: そうだね、そういう曲作ってる方ですね
subtitles.english: Right, he's the one who makes those kinds of songs.

subtitles.original: ちなみに21時30分からですね、こちらの「僕らの星座」という楽曲...
subtitles.english: By the way, from 21:30, the music video for this song "Bokura no Seiza"...

subtitles.original: ...MV公開予定でございますので、そちらもよろしくお願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: ...is scheduled to be released, so please check that out too!

subtitles.original: 絶対買ってね、絶対よろしく
subtitles.english: Be sure to buy it, please.

subtitles.original: 買えよ、聴けよ、21時から配信もございます、聴いてね
subtitles.english: Buy it, listen to it, there's also a stream from 21:00, listen to it.

subtitles.original: おい、おい！
subtitles.english: Oi, oi!

subtitles.original: ということで、今から歌わせていただくんですけども...
subtitles.english: So, I'm going to sing now...

subtitles.original: え、フブニコメントもしかしていてくれるの？
subtitles.english: Wait, Fubunicomet, are you going to stay?

subtitles.original: フブちゃん、フブちゃん
subtitles.english: Fubu-chan, Fubu-chan.

subtitles.original: ニコメットはずっと一緒だよ、嘘だよ
subtitles.english: Nicomets are always together. Just kidding.

subtitles.original: いつでも一緒だよ
subtitles.english: Always together.

subtitles.original: そうなの、じゃあ、一緒にちょっとパフォーマンスしてくれるの？
subtitles.english: Is that so? Then, will you perform with me for a bit?

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃん！
subtitles.english: Of course!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、この「僕らの星座」、前に円形ステージがあるので...
subtitles.english: Well then, for "Bokura no Seiza", there's a circular stage in front...

subtitles.original: ...そこで一緒に踊りましょう、歌って踊りましょう
subtitles.english: ...so let's dance together there, let's sing and dance.

subtitles.original: わかった、はい
subtitles.english: Got it, yes.

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください、「僕らの星座」、ゴー！
subtitles.english: Then please listen, "Bokura no Seiza", go!

subtitles.original:
僕らの星座
作詞・作曲・編曲：Revo
subtitles.english:
Bokura no Seiza
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Revo

subtitles.original: 始まりはきっと一つの願い
subtitles.english: It surely started with a single wish

subtitles.original: それを抱いて私は生まれた
subtitles.english: Embracing it, I was born

subtitles.original: 孤独な夜空震える指で
subtitles.english: In the lonely night sky, with trembling fingers

subtitles.original: 点と点を繋げよう
subtitles.english: Let's connect the dots

subtitles.original: 1次元では寂しすぎるから
subtitles.english: Because it's too lonely in one dimension

subtitles.original: 私たちは広がりを求めた
subtitles.english: We sought to expand

subtitles.original: 点は線となり線は立体となり
subtitles.english: Dots became lines, lines became solids

subtitles.original: そこに距離が生まれたけれど
subtitles.english: And though distance was born there

subtitles.original: 3次元ではちょっと遠すぎるから
subtitles.english: Because it's a bit too far in three dimensions

subtitles.original: 私たちは平面に求めた
subtitles.english: We sought it on a plane

subtitles.original: 点は星となり星は星座となり
subtitles.english: Dots became stars, stars became constellations

subtitles.original: この夜空を繋ぐよ
subtitles.english: Connecting this night sky

subtitles.original: 自分らしくいられる場所を
subtitles.english: A place where I can be myself

subtitles.original: 気付けばずっと探していた
subtitles.english: I realized I'd been searching for it all along

subtitles.original: 煌めく星を飾り留め
subtitles.english: Gathering and fixing the sparkling stars

subtitles.original: この白旗を目印に
subtitles.english: Using this white flag as a marker

subtitles.original: あの日君がいつもそこにいたから
subtitles.english: Because you were always there that day

subtitles.original: 嬉しくて続けられたんだ今日まで
subtitles.english: I was so happy I could keep going until today

subtitles.original: 忘れないでね僕らの星座は
subtitles.english: Please don't forget, our constellation

subtitles.original: 君がいたから生まれた
subtitles.english: Was born because you were here

subtitles.original: 2次元では楽しすぎたから
subtitles.english: Because it was too much fun in two dimensions

subtitles.original: 私たちは毎日を笑った
subtitles.english: We laughed every day

subtitles.original: 秒は分となり分は時間となり
subtitles.english: Seconds became minutes, minutes became hours

subtitles.original: 辛いことも忘れて
subtitles.english: Forgetting even the painful things

subtitles.original: 自分らしく笑える場所を
subtitles.english: A place where I can laugh like myself

subtitles.original: 気付けば闇に星は満ちた
subtitles.english: I realized the darkness was filled with stars

subtitles.original: 重ねる歌で思いを刻め
subtitles.english: Carve your thoughts with layered songs

subtitles.original: この白亜の城壁に
subtitles.english: On these white castle walls

subtitles.original: だから君がいつか自分自身の輝きを見失ったときには
subtitles.english: So when you one day lose sight of your own brilliance

subtitles.original: 思い出してね僕らの星座は
subtitles.english: Please remember, our constellation

subtitles.original: 君がいるから輝く
subtitles.english: Shines because you are here
